question_text: Why is device compatibility important when selecting a stylus for a tablet?
answer_options: Styluses only work on Android devices
Styluses change color depending on screen
Incompatible styluses may lack full feature support
All styluses are universal and interchangeable
correct_answer: Incompatible styluses may lack full feature support
explanation: Styluses often rely on manufacturer-specific tech; incompatible models may lack pressure sensitivity or button functions.
